column3: The kids had a great time here playing. We all got together to watch the kids play and talk. By the time we were done in this park they were asleep leaving in the car seats

column2: Fun Park at Rosemead's Largest Public Park - Swimming, Picnics, Sports Fields and More
column3: We have enjoyed going to Rosemead Park numerous times.The park is Rosemead's largest park and is well maintained.We like it as it has a swimming pool, par course, sports fields, playground areas and lots of place.Its a good place to go for a picnic.
